required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Metabolism of Branched-chain Amino Acids in Monocyte/Macrophage During Sepsis
clinical_study.official_title: Metabolism of Branched-chain Amino Acids in Monocyte and Macrophage During Sepsis

brief_summary.textblock: The current project was designed to examine the metabolic level of branched-chain amino acids in plasm and monocyte/macrophage, and its role in immune dysfunction during sepsis.

detailed_description.textblock: In this study, the investigators will collect the peripheral blood of 1,3,7,14 day after diagnose of sepsis. Then, the concentration of branched-chain amino acids(BCAAs) in monocytes and plasma, and the expression of BCAAs metabolic enzymes in monocytes will be determined. Additionally, the inflammatory cytokines, e.g., Interleukin-1β (IL-1β), Tumor necrosis factor-α (TNF-α), Interleukin-10 (IL-10）, the chemokines macrophage inflammatory proteins 1α and 1β (MIP-1α and 1β) in the peripheral blood and the phagocytic function of monocytes will also be detected. The current project was designed to examine the metabolic level of branched-chain amino acids in plasm and monocyte/macrophage, and its role in immune dysfunction during sepsis.

primary_outcome.measure: Intracellular levels of branched-chain amino acids in monocytes
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 14 day after diagnose of sepsis
primary_outcome.description: BCAAs Assay Kit will be used to measure the intracellular levels of BCAAs in monocytes.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma levels of branched-chain amino acids
secondary_outcome.description: BCAAs Assay Kit will be used to measure the plasma levels of BCAAs.

secondary_outcome.measure: The expression of branched-chain amino acid aminotransferase in monocytes
secondary_outcome.description: The expression of branched-chain amino acid aminotransferase in monocytes will be determined by qPCR and western blot.

secondary_outcome.measure: The expression of branched-chain α-ketoacid dehydrogenase in monocytes
secondary_outcome.description: The expression of branched-chain α-ketoacid dehydrogenase in monocytes will be determined by qPCR and western blot.

secondary_outcome.measure: The expression of PP2Cm in monocytes
secondary_outcome.description: The expression of mitochondrial-targeted phosphatase, PP2Cm in monocytes will be determined by qPCR and western blot.
The plasma level of IL-1β will be determined by ELISA kit.
The plasma level of TNF-α will be determined by ELISA kit.
The level of IL-10 will be determined by ELISA kit.

secondary_outcome.measure: The plasma level of chemokine MIP-1α.
secondary_outcome.description: The plasma level of chemokine MIP-1α will be determined by ELISA kit.

secondary_outcome.measure: The plasma level of chemokine MIP-1β.
secondary_outcome.description: The plasma level of chemokine MIP-1β will be determined by ELISA kit.
The phagocytic index of monocytes will be determined by a E.coli Phagocytosis Assay Kit.

intervention.intervention_name: Metabolic level of BCAAs in monocytes and macrophages
intervention.description: Metabolic level of BCAAs in monocytes and macrophages

study_pop.textblock: Patients who are diagnosed as sepsis, with or without type 2 diabetes.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients diagnosed with sepsis, with or without type 2 diabetes
- healthy volunteers
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with immunodeficient diseases
- patients who accept glucocorticoid or immunosuppressant
- patients with an age younger than 18 years
- patients who cannot provide the informed consent
